messages.message: Any one else finding that page provenance vs page number is sometimes wrong
Yes, we have seen this issue. Working on a fix right now to improve the provenance performance @Rafal

@Orlando this is a UI scrolling issue -- you are viewing page 67, all you need is to scroll down just a little bit and it'll show page 67 in the doc viewer. cc @Udit (think you implemented the autoscroll? i might be tagging the wrong person)

it's not a model issue
feel free to try again and verify

the correct provenance for the answer is the table and the table is on page 66 as shown in docViewer. I think the issue is just the answer says its page 67 instead of page 66. The doc viewer is doing the correct scroll
Seems the model's provenance that it gives back is correct, but the UI page number tag below the answer is giving the wrong page?
no no no, it's the scrolling always scroll a bit too high, so the page number is shown in the doc viewer is often a page less than the actual page
i can do a screenshare real quick
Oh I see what you mean now â€” he is on the correct page and the model is giving the correct page and provenance too, it just shows the wrong number on the page number input
yes! if you have trouble reproduce let me know
